title: ➽Gorgeous Modern Top Floor Cambridge 1 Bedroom! Pet-Friendly!
posting_body: Gorgeous Modern Top Floor Cambridge 1 Bedroom Featuring Hardwood Floors, Central Air/Heat, Modern Appliances, Granite Counter Tops, a Dishwasher, Microwave, High Ceilings, Fantastic Natural Light, Great Closet Space, and an In-Unit Washer/Dryer.
Right in the Gorgeous Cambridge near the Red Line, Porter Square, Harvard University, the Grocery Store, and Multiple Fantastic Restaurants.
CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams
Move in Costs: First Month's Rent, Security Deposit (Negotiable), and Broker Fee (No Last Month's Rent Upfront)

I would love to work with you and find you a fantastic apartment, I offer Boston's largest personalized video database for ease of access!
